snippet: After a letter from civil liberties lawyers complaining that security measures at the park violated zoning laws, a loosening of restrictions and jubilation from protesters.
abstract: After a letter from civil liberties lawyers complaining that security measures at the park violated zoning laws, a loosening of restrictions and jubilation from protesters.
lead_paragraph: Updated, 10:07 a.m. | Security guards working for Brookfield Properties took down a cordon of metal barricades surrounding Zuccotti Park on Tuesday evening, but entered the park later that night to enforce rules forbidding anyone to lie down.

headline.main: Barricades Come Down at Zuccotti Park
